mapper.select: select count(1) from apply_friend_info where invitation_code=#{friendInvitationCode} and friend_invitation_code=#{invitationCode}
mapper.insert: insert into apply_friend_info (invitation_code, friend_invitation_code, apply_info, is_approve, create_time, modify_time) values (#{friendInvitationCode}, #{invitationCode}, #{applyInfo}, 0, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime})
mapper.update: update apply_friend_info set apply_info=#{applyInfo},is_approve=0 ,modify_time=#{modifyTime} where invitation_code=#{friendInvitationCode} and friend_invitation_code=#{invitationCode}
mapper.select: select friend.id,member.phone_no friendPhoneNo,friend.apply_info applyInfo,friend.is_approve isApprove, member.head_pic headPic,member.nick_name friendNickName from apply_friend_info friend left join member_info member on member.invitation_code = friend.friend_invitation_code where friend.invitation_code = #{invitationCode} order by friend.modify_time desc
mapper.update: update apply_friend_info set is_approve=#{isApprove} where id = #{applicationId}
